To characterize effectiveness acne treatment Investigator 's Global Improvement Assessment week 1 , week 2 , week 6 , week 12 , week 24 compare baseline compare treatments 3 . To characterize effect acne treatment subject self-assessment questionnaire response week 1 , week 2 , week 6 , week 12 , week 24 compare baseline compare treatment
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Trial Evaluate Efficacy Two Acne Treatments
